description: Reki is Wavemaster and the assistant of Balmung, after Balmung becomes a System Administrator for C.C. Corp. Reki frequently acts as a proxy for his boss, since Balmung likes to participate in the events that he has planned. In real life, Reki is a history major who couldn`t find work in his field, so he joined C.C. Corp; his real name is Satoshi Fujio
name: Reki
